biography: Mikael, a familiar name at Kurk Golf, is known for his analytical approach to the game.
While he has graced the greens of the Hector Troph√©e on one occasion, Mikael has not yet lifted the coveted trophy nor claimed the individual Victor title.

Currently considered retired from Hector events, Mikael's presence on the course is missed. However, golf enthusiasts know that anything can happen, and a return to competition is always a possibility.
